alert.note: Alert for Koochiching (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 10:13PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Koochiching County through 1045 PM CDT... At 1013 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles northwest of Margie, to near Gemmell, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Falls and Margie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
